profile:
Window Mart provides High Quality and Energy Efficient windows and doors products. We are a team of real people with real values, building real relationships with customers. Window Mart comes to your windows and doors projects with top quality products, professional installation service, prompt after sale service and most important, competitive price.

***

Window Mart is a  company that offers an end-to-end solution for replacement windows and doors in Ontario, Alberta and Saskatchewan. Over the years we have worked hard to build a professional team of sales representatives and installers, whose first priority is our customers satisfaction. Our goal is simple, we want to install top quality windows and doors which we would enjoy in our own home.

profile:
RVW Ltd is an Alberta registered and licensed company serving Canada since 1985. We specialize in residential and commercial window systems supply and installation for new construction and renovation projects.

We have a proficient team, experienced with all types of installations. In the past year we have completed over 350 projects for home owners and over 50 projects for businesses. We continuously carry out various projects for the City of Calgary, the Alberta Government as well as property management, architectural and design companies.

RVW Ltd has a solid reputation and excellent credentials. We have 10 out of 10 rating on Home Stars, A+ rating with BBB and can provide references from our major clients. Additionally, we have been a preferred contractor for Alberta Parks since April of 2016.

Safety is one of our main priorities and weâ€™ve been holding a SECOR from June 15th, 2017. All required training, like Fall Protection, Aerial Work Platform, First Aid and WHMIS, is provided for employees. All of our employees follow our professionally developed Safety Program.
